Have you ever asked a question and the answer is 42? Sometimes answers can be confusing... Our goal is to make sure we help simplify answers to some of the most basic questions about the startup life and entrepreneurial game.For a fun read check out this explanation about what we like to think "42" really means...The True Meaning of 42In ‚ÄòThe Hitchhiker‚Äôs Guide to the Galaxy‚Äô, a best-selling book and cult classic movie, the supercomputer ‚ÄòDeep Thought‚Äô is built by a race of hyper-intelligent alien beings to determine the answer to ‚Äúlife, the universe, and everything.‚ÄùDeep Thought, after 7.5 million years of computing and deliberation, determines that the answer is, somewhat anticlimactically, ‚Äú42.‚Äù It sounds like a joke, but is the more to this answer? Douglas Adams was an unabashed computer nerd and knew a heck of a lot about programming languages and coding.In programming, an asterisk is commonly used to translate as ‚Äòwhatever you want it to be‚Äù - and in ASCII language, the most basic computer software, ‚Äú42‚Äù is the designation for an asterisk. A computer, Deep Thought, was asked what the true meaning of life was and it answered as a computer would‚Ä¶ ‚Äú42‚Äù = ‚Äúanything YOU want it to be.‚Äù - Pure Genius!

Adora is the most charitable cause marketing platform in the world. We set aside 50% of our revenue for charity.Users get to choose their favorite charity or charitable cause when they download our free mobile app. Then their activity determines how much is donated to their cause, every month. This creates consistency for these charities, a thing not common to the non-profit funding world.Our Beta product is LIVE on both the Google Play store & the Apple App store - Please search for "Adora" on the app stores and download Adora today!

Sharpn is all about the entrepreneurial & Intrapreneurial journey and how to better navigate the sometimes unpredictable waters we find ourselves in. It's about practice, productivity, endurance, and most of all community. Learn more about how you can find your edge at http://sharpn.me/

Kyle is not only a friend nor a brother, He is leader, a teacher and a great mentor. He had taught me things that I cannot get or learn from others, he gave me a better understanding of how my life should be. To have a FREEDOM OF CHOICE. I have love this guys the way he is for what he is. We've been through thick and thin. Kyle is an exceptional at everything he does.He works so hard that he never finds time to rest. summary: I am a lover of the journey that comes with building and exploring amazing companies - Adora, a mobile charity app & ep42, where we create ELE's (Experiential Learning Environments) are both on my plate right now.I am also a farmers/ranchers grandson, general contractors son, a marketing scientist who turned in the serial entrepreneur I am today.Mine is a wild story. A journey that started in Texas, includes moments from coast to coast in the US of A and even across the seas to Asia. With all of the eye-opening experiences you could imagine one thing stands out - People - they are the only thing worth working for. Teaching, inspiring, leading, following, comforting, loving, caring, nurturing and the list could go on and on - these are the activities that fill my mind and heart.I love the marketing world, it was never just a job to me but a passion. I love helping people see what makes a product or company great, how to communicate about it and why someone should be a fanatic about this brand or that one. Adora is an amazing way to get the word out about the good that companies do and I am so excited to be part of telling those stories.Strengths: I love finding people smarter than myself then learning from them and what they do best. I've been blessed with a great gift for absorbing an immense amount of info in a very short time and holding on to most of what I learn. As a result I am your quint essential "Jack of all Trades" and a "master of many" in the making (youth comes with its drawbacks, to be great takes time). Hard work, vision, creativity, inspiration, marketing, sales, business development, and general strategic planning are all areas where I excel and continue to grow.
